passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(8) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h4:nth-child(1)
